results.content: Отличный практический курс для fullstack-developers. Не подойдет для начинающих. Скорее для тех кто имеет аналогичный опыт работы на других языках и фрэймворках.

results.content: Love the course, instructor is very knowledgeable about golang, and if you should have any issues he has been good at answering your questions in a timely fashion.
results.content_html: Love the course, instructor is very knowledgeable about golang, and if you should have any issues he has been good at answering your questions in a timely fashion.

results.content: Fantastic whistle stop tour of Go and Vue 3. Exactly what I was looking for to quickly get acquainted with both these subjects in a practical working context.
results.content_html: Fantastic whistle stop tour of Go and Vue 3. Exactly what I was looking for to quickly get acquainted with both these subjects in a practical working context.

results.content: Fantastic. I like how quick it is to get an MVP going from tutorial. Any extra info needed for learning can easily be found on google. This gives me a giant leap in the right direction.
